page.title: 20FARMING AND CREDITS
page.content: {A typical farm-}Gonsal Farm is privately owned and has 200 acres.It is mixed arable and dairy with 150 milking cows.It grows silage,corn and oilseedrape,the latter being used to make margarine.There are also 400 pigs.Some machinery is hired although the farm does own four tractors and a combine harvester.There are 30 dry cows for calving,2 bulls, 3 beef cattle and 20 calves.{Credits-Matthew {Woodward,Miranda Garrard,Clare {Cronshey,Sharon Jones,Olwen Walker, {Tracey Lewin,Helen Bowers,Shane Lycett {Tim Woodward,Andrew Challinor,Fred {Reeves,Louise Hickman,Sara {McIntyre,Claire Butler,Jeremy Heath, {Gareth Walker,David Challenor, {Christopher Roberts,Adrian Morris, {Clare Ashley,Claire Stevens,Claire {Jones,Tracey Morgan,Juliet Garrard {Kellie Snowdon.
